Detailed Description

template<int N>
class roboptim::Polynomial< N >

Polynomial of degree at most N.

template<int N>
template<int M>
roboptim::Polynomial< N >::Polynomial ( const Polynomial< M > &  p)

Copy constructor of polynomials of different orders.

Warning:
If N < M, coefficients of higher degrees will be discarded. This is only valid if you are considering |t-t₀|«1.
Template Parameters:
Mdegree of the copied polynomial.
Parameters:
pcopied polynomial.

References roboptim::Polynomial< N >::coefs().
